1.14.notes: Adds global stats and progress for HTTP downloads

1.15.notes: Fixes two bugs in 1.14: exposes the HTTP interface and fixes setting the AppID for game processes under certain circumstances.

1.16.notes: Introduces an interface for adding screenshots to the Steam library, and an HTTP interface for raw POST data.

1.17.notes: Supports sharing cloud files with the Steam community. Adds Steam Workshop integration and a tool for automated DRM submissions. Also includes updates for using WebAPI AuthenticateUserTicket and merging of ISteamMasterServerUpdater with ISteamGameServer interface.

1.18.notes: Simplifies sharing workshop files, changes the mechanism to update existing workshop files, increases description fields to 8000 characters, and provides an interface to check on the download progress of cloud files.

1.19.notes: Includes new functionality related to Followers in the Steam Community as well as adding new Steam Workshop APIs to browse and vote on submitted files.

1.20.notes: Includes local server and builder tools for new content system (SteamPipe), 64-bit build targets for OS X, and various friends, cloud and user stats features.

1.21.notes: Exposes gamepad text input controls to Steamworks titles.

1.22.notes: Adds support for streaming HTTP requests and allows reading files in chunks, increasing the maximum cloud file size.

1.23a.notes: Version 1.23a is identical to 1.23, except it fixes a bug with passing command-line parameters through SteamAPI_RestartAppIfNecessary().

1.25.notes: Fixes ISteamRemoteStorage::GetPublishedFileDetails not working properly in the 1.24 SDK update.

1.26a.notes: Version 1.26a is identical to 1.26 except a missing accessor function for SteamUGC() was added.

1.27.notes: Adds ISteamController interfaces for adding native support to your game for the new Steam Controllers in beta now.

1.28.notes: Adds the Steamworks Virtual Reality API.

1.29a.notes: Fixes a memory corruption in ISteamUGC::GetQueryUGCResult. Version 1.29a is identical to version 1.29 except for this fix.

1.30.notes: Include a new Workshop content API in ISteamUGC.

1.31.notes: Adds support for existing Workshop files from the new ISteamUGC interface, a built-in HTML rendering surface and updates for Steam VR.

1.32.notes: Adds C# bindings, a flat C-style API, improvements to the HTTP interface, and an initial release of the Steam Inventory Service.

1.33b.notes: Version 1.33b is identical to 1.33a, except ISteamUGC is exposed to game servers now.

1.34.notes: Includes new Workshop functionality in ISteamUGC.

1.35.notes: Adds support for production Steam Controllers to ISteamController, as well as new functionality in ISteamRemoteStorage.

1.35a.notes: Added a new function to assist with memory-management issues in games that call Steamworks from multiple threads. Version 1.35a is identical to version 1.35 except for this new function.

1.36.notes: A new function was added to ISteamController. Includes updated redistributables.

1.37.notes: Better support forward compatibility. The ISteamUGC interface has also been expanded to support developer defined preview files.

1.38a.notes: Version 1.38a is identical to 1.38, except libsteam_api.dylib has been included for Mac OSX.

1.39.notes: Future-proofs Steam controller API and expands on Steam Inventory Service functionality.

1.40.notes: Changes to ISteamInventory, ISteamUtils, ISteamUser, ISteamUGC and ISteamVideo. The SteamPipe GUI wrapper tool is now included the SDK.

1.41.notes: Changes to ISteamClient, ISteamHTMLSurface, ISteamParentalSettings, ISteamUGC

1.42.notes: Changes to ISteamInventory, ISteamController, ISteamHTMLSurface, ISteamFriends

1.43.notes: Adds new APIs ISteamParties and ISteamInput. Changes to ISteamController, ISteamFriends, ISteamInventory, ISteamUGC and ISteamApps

1.44.notes: Adds new APIs ISteamNetworkingSockets and ISteamNetworkingUtils

1.45.notes: Adds duration control \/ anti-indulgence APIs on ISteamUser. Adds Steam China client detection and a new FilterText API on ISteamUtils. Adds GetDeviceBindingRevision API on ISteamInput.

1.46.notes: Adds new API ISteamRemotePlay. Changes to ISteamInput

1.47.notes: Changes to ISteamNetworkingSockets and ISteamRemotePlay. steamcmd is now 64-bit on macOS

1.48a.notes: Version 1.48a is identical to 1.48, except libsdkencryptedappticket.dylib is properly signed to allow notarization.

1.49.notes: Adds new functions to ISteamApps, ISteamFriends & ISteamuserStats.

1.50.notes: Adds new text filtering functions to ISteamUtils, added ISteamNetworkingMessages, added poll groups and symmetric connect mode to ISteamNetworkingSockets, ISteamNetworking is now deprecated.

1.51.notes: Adds ISteamUGC::GetQueryUGCNumTags(), ISteamUGC::GetQueryUGCTag(), and ISteamUGC::GetQueryUGCTagDisplayName() for access to an item's tags and the display names (e.g. localized versions) of those tags; ISteamFriends::ActivateGameOverlayInviteDialogConnectString to activate the game overlay to open an invite dialog that will send the provided Rich Presence connect string to selected friends

1.52.notes: Changes to ISteamInput, ISteamGameServer, ISteamRemoteStorage, ISteamUGC, ISteamUser, and ISteamUtils. Adds arm64 support to macOS libaries. The Steamworks example project has also been updated.

1.53a.notes: Version 1.53a is identical to 1.53, except libsdkencryptedappticket.dylib includes support for arm64

1.54.notes: Adds ability to retrieve equipped Steam Community profile items to ISteamFriends

1.55.notes: Adds DualSense trigger support to ISteamInput

1.56.notes: Update GetAuthSessionTicket API to include a SteamNetworkingIdentity as input

1.57.notes: Add GetAuthTicketForWebApi API to be used instead of GetAuthSessionTicket API when calling Web Api AuthenticateUserTicket

1.58.notes: Adds support for setting admin tags through ISteamUGC, the ability to start a Remote Play Together session, and better handling for corrupt encrypted app tickets

1.58a.notes: Version 1.58a is identical to 1.58, but includes fixes to steam_api_flat.h

1.59.notes: Adds a new initialization entry point, SteamAPI_InitFlat, intended for non-C++ projects.

1.60.notes: Adds ISteamTimeline and game beta control functions

1.61.notes: Improved ISteamTimeline based on developer feedback

1.62.notes: Adds the ability to get distinct mouse and keyboard input from remote players using ISteamRemotePlay
